message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested!
Alice, thank you for the offer, but $18000 is higher than my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $8500 at this time. Let me know if you're willing to work with me.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but $8500 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $14000. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in!

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $14000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $10000. If you're not able to accept that, I'll unfortunately have to look at other options.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but $10000 is still below my minimum. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'm counteroffering at $13000. This is my final offer, let me know if it's something you'd like to accept.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13000 is still outside of my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $11000. If this isn't acceptable, I'll need to explore other options.
